frizz.name: Frizz
frizz.description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

frizzle.name: Frizzle
frizzle.description: Inflicts medium fire-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

splish.name: Splish
splish.description: Inflicts minor water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: Inflicts medium water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

woosh.name: Woosh
woosh.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

swoosh.name: Swoosh
swoosh.description: Inflicts medium wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

crag.name: Crag
crag.description: Inflicts minor earth-elemental spell damage on a single enemy, but not until the following round.

bang.name: Bang
bang.description: Inflicts minor explosive spell damage on all enemies.

boom.name: Boom
boom.description: Inflicts medium explosive spell damage on all enemies.

crack.name: Crack
crack.description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

crackle.name: Crackle
crackle.description: Inflicts medium ice-elemental spell damage on a all enemies.

zap.name: Zap
zap.description: Inflicts minor electrical spell damage on a single enemy.

zapple.name: Zapple
zapple.description: Inflicts medium electrical spell damage on all enemies.

sizz.name: Sizz
sizz.description: Inflicts minor light-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

sizzle.name: Sizzle
sizzle.description: Inflicts medium light-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

zam.name: Zam
zam.description: Inflicts minor dark-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

zammle.name: Zammle
zammle.description: Inflicts medium dark-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

magic_pop.name: Magic Pop
magic_pop.description: Uses 1/4 of remaining MP to inflict light-elemental damage on a single enemy, for a weaker rendition of a more extreme spell. The more MP the monster has at the time of casting, the greater the damage will be.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Restores 28 or more HP to a single ally.

midheal.name: Midheal
midheal.description: Restores 76 or more HP to a single ally.

zing.name: Zing
zing.description: Resurrects a fallen ally. Has a chance of failure.

kazing.name: Kazing
kazing.description: Is guaranteed to resurrect a fallen ally.

squelch.name: Squelch
squelch.description: Cures all allies of poison or severe poison.

oomph.name: Oomph
oomph.description: Greatly increases the attack of a single ally for 2 to 5 turns.

oomphle.name: Oomphle
oomphle.description: Increases the attack of all allies for 2 to 5 turns.

blunt.name: Blunt
blunt.description: Greatly decreases the attack of a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

buff.name: Buff
buff.description: Greatly increases the defence of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

kabuff.name: Kabuff
kabuff.description: Greatly increases the defence of all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

sap.name: Sap
sap.description: Greatly decreases the defence of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

kasap.name: Kasap
kasap.description: Greatly decreases the defence of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

accelerate.name: Accelerate
accelerate.description: Greatly increases the agility of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

acceleratle.name: Acceleratle
acceleratle.description: Increases the agility of all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

decelerate.name: Decelerate
decelerate.description: Greatly decreases the agility of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

deceleratle.name: Deceleratle
deceleratle.description: Greatly decreases the agility of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

ping.name: Ping
ping.description: Greatly increases the wisdom of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

dim.name: Dim
dim.description: Greatly decreases the wisdom of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

kadim.name: Kadim
kadim.description: Decreases the wisdom of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

insulate.name: Insulate
insulate.description: Greatly reduces the damage received from breath attacks by a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

insulatle.name: Insulatle
insulatle.description: Reduces the damage received from breath attacks by all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

dazzle.name: Dazzle
dazzle.description: Bedazzles all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

fizzle.name: Fizzle
fizzle.description: Prevents all enemies from casting spells for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

drain_magic.name: Drain Magic
drain_magic.description: Absorbs some MP from a single enemy.

giga_drain_magic.name: Giga Drain Magic
giga_drain_magic.description: Absorbs MP from enemies at random, 4 times in total.

fuddle.name: Fuddle
fuddle.description: Confuses a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

snooze.name: Snooze
snooze.description: Puts a single enemy to sleep for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

numb.name: Numb
numb.description: Paralyses a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

kanumb.name: Kanumb
kanumb.description: Paralyses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

tox.name: Tox
tox.description: Poisons a single enemy. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

katox.name: Katox
katox.description: Poisons all enemies. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

whack.name: Whack
whack.description: Kills a single enemy instantly. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

thwack.name: Thwack
thwack.description: Kills all enemies instantly. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

kamikazee.name: Kamikazee
kamikazee.description: Kill all enemies, but at the cost of the caster's life. The caster cannot be resurrected in the same battle. The higher the caster's MP, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

flame_slash.name: Flame Slash
flame_slash.description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

gust_slash.name: Gust Slash
gust_slash.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

kacrackle_slash.name: Kacrackle Slash
kacrackle_slash.description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

lightning_slash.name: Lightning Slash
lightning_slash.description: Inflicts minor electrical slashing damage on a single enemy.

flamesplitter.name: Flamesplitter
flamesplitter.description: Inflicts heavy fire-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

skysplitter.name: Skysplitter
skysplitter.description: Inflicts medium wind-elemental slashing damage on all enemies.

gigaslash.name: Gigaslash
gigaslash.description: Inflicts outrageous electrical damage on a single enemy. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

slime_squisher.name: Slime Squisher
slime_squisher.description: Inflicts heavy impact damage on monsters in the slime family.

dragon_slash.name: Dragon Slash
dragon_slash.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the dragon family.

nature_nerfer.name: Nature Nerfer
nature_nerfer.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the nature family.

matter_scatterer.name: Matter Scatterer
matter_scatterer.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the material family.

demon_demeaner.name: Demon Demeaner
demon_demeaner.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the demon family.

undead_undoer.name: Undead Undoer
undead_undoer.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the undead family.

shining_shot.name: Shining Shot
shining_shot.description: Inflicts light-elemental damage on enemies at random, 4 to 12 times in total.

multislash.name: Multislash
multislash.description: Inflicts slashing damage on all enemies. Enemies that are further to the right-hand side of the battlefield receive less damage.

mercurial_thrust.name: Mercurial Thrust
mercurial_thrust.description: A punching technique that only inflicts a small amount of damage, but allows the user to attack before anyone else.

anchorman.name: Anchorman
anchorman.description: Acts after everyone else to inflict extreme impact damage on an enemy.

knuckle_sandwich.name: Knuckle Sandwich
knuckle_sandwich.description: Focuses strength in order to inflict heavy damage on a single enemy in the next turn, ignoring their defence attribute.

hatchet_man.name: Hatchet Man
hatchet_man.description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy. The attack has a high likelihood of missing, but an increased chance of inflicting a critical hit when it succeeds.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: A risky technique that inflicts a critical hit on a single enemy or ally at random.

miracle_slash.name: Miracle Slash
miracle_slash.description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy. Approximately half the amount of damage inflicted is restored to the user as HP. Can heal up to a maximum of 200 HP.

attack_attacker.name: Attack Attacker
attack_attacker.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally lowers its attack for 2 to 5 turns.

helm_splitter.name: Helm Splitter
helm_splitter.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally lowers its defence for 4 to 7 turns.

confusion_attack.name: Confusion Attack
confusion_attack.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally confuses it for 2 to 5 turns.

sleep_attack.name: Sleep Attack
sleep_attack.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally puts it to sleep for 2 to 5 turns.

paralysing_punch.name: Paralysing Punch
paralysing_punch.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally paralyses it for 2 to 5 turns.

heart_breaker.name: Heart Breaker
heart_breaker.description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy and stuns it for 1 turn.

poison_attack.name: Poison Attack
poison_attack.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally poisons it.

assassins_stab.name: Assassin's Stab
assassins_stab.description: Damages an enemy and occasionally causes instant death.

victimiser.name: Victimiser
victimiser.description: Damages a single enemy. Highly effective against enemies that are poisoned, severely poisoned or paralysed.

persecutter.name: Persecutter
persecutter.description: Damages a single enemy. Highly effective against enemies that are asleep or confused.

multi_persecutter.name: Multi-Persecutter
multi_persecutter.description: Damages all enemies. Highly effective against enemies that are asleep or confused.

wind_sickles.name: Wind Sickles
wind_sickles.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental damage on a single enemy.

thin_air.name: Thin Air
thin_air.description: Inflicts medium wind-elemental damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

stones_throw.name: Stone's Throw
stones_throw.description: Inflicts minor earth-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
lightning_storm.description: Inflicts outrageous electrical damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: Inflicts medium earth-elemental damage on all enemies. The higher the user's level, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

meditation.name: Meditation
meditation.description: Restores 300 or more HP to the user.

right_as_rain.name: Right as Rain
right_as_rain.description: Performs a rainmaking ritual that invokes a healing shower in the next turn. Restores a random amount of HP to all allies.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: Whips up a dense cloud of dust that lowers the accuracy of enemy attacks for 2 to 5 turns.

dazzleflash.name: Dazzleflash
dazzleflash.description: Unleashes a blinding light that lowers the accuracy of enemy attacks for 2 to 5 turns.

gobstopper.name: Gobstopper
gobstopper.description: Stops a single enemy from using its mouth, preventing the use of breath attacks for 4 to 7 turns.

critical_meltdown.name: Critical Meltdown
critical_meltdown.description: Prevents a single enemy from inflicting critical hits for 4 to 7 turns.

brake_wind.name: Brake Wind
brake_wind.description: Reflects breath attacks back at the enemy. Protects all allies once only.

mist_me.name: Mist Me
mist_me.description: Negates all damage 1 time only. Ineffective against certain attacks.

war_cry.name: War Cry
war_cry.description: An ear-popping shout that stuns all enemies for 1 turn.

tongue_lashing.name: Tongue Lashing
tongue_lashing.description: Slathers a single enemy with slimy saliva, stunning it and lowering its defence.

tongue_bashing.name: Tongue Bashing
tongue_bashing.description: Savagely slathers a single enemy with slimy saliva, stunning it and reducing its defence attribute to 1.

seethe.name: Seethe
seethe.description: Internalises rage in order to raise the damage of the next attack. Furthermore, the user's attacks become more difficult for the enemy to dodge.

dodgy_dance.name: Dodgy Dance
dodgy_dance.description: Raises the user's evasion for 4 to 7 turns.

selflessness.name: Selflessness
selflessness.description: Receives all incoming attacks in place of allies for 1 round, but suffers greater damage in doing so.

fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
fire_breath.description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

flame_breath.name: Flame Breath
flame_breath.description: Inflicts medium fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

cool_breath.name: Cool Breath
cool_breath.description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

chilly_breath.name: Chilly Breath
chilly_breath.description: Inflicts medium ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

deep_breath.name: Deep Breath
deep_breath.description: Inhales long and deep, raising the damage inflicted by the user's next breath attack.

sweet_breath.name: Sweet Breath
sweet_breath.description: Lets out an exhalation of relaxation that puts all enemies to sleep for 2 to 5 turns.

burning_breath.name: Burning Breath
burning_breath.description: Lets out an exhalation of immobilisation that paralyses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns.

poison_breath.name: Poison Breath
poison_breath.description: Exhales toxic fumes that poison all enemies.

fan_dango.name: Fan Dango
fan_dango.description: A dance that damages enemies at random, 3 or 4 times in total. The higher the user's agility, the greater the damage that will be inflicted.

sword_dance.name: Sword Dance
sword_dance.description: A dance that damages enemies at random, 3 to 7 times in total.

weird_dance.name: Weird Dance
weird_dance.description: A dance that decreases the MP of a single enemy.

tap_dance.name: Tap Dance
tap_dance.description: A dance that absorbs some MP from a single enemy.

fuddle_dance.name: Fuddle Dance
fuddle_dance.description: A dance that confuses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns.

sultry_dance.name: Sultry Dance
sultry_dance.description: A bewitching dance that stuns all enemies for 1 turn.

intense_defence.name: Intense Defence
intense_defence.description: Assumes an impenetrable defensive stance that reduces most damage received by 9/10. Can only be used once per battle.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: Reflects most spells back at the caster for 4 to 7 turns.
